description: AN ADVANCE CONTRACT AWARD NOTICE (ACAN) IS A PUBLIC NOTICE INDICATING TO THE SUPPLIER COMMUNITY THAT A DEPARTMENT OR AGENCY INTENDS TO AWARD A CONTRACT FOR GOODS, SERVICES OR CONSTRUCTION TO A PRE-IDENTIFIED SUPPLIER, THEREBY ALLOWING OTHER SUPPLIERS TO SIGNAL THEIR INTEREST IN BIDDING, BY SUBMITTING A STATEMENT OF CAPABILITY.,
full_summary:
# M5000-232374 - Advance Contract Award Notice for Long Range Initiation System

## Announcement Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (TPSGC/PWGS) is pleased to issue an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the procurement of a Long Range Initiation System (LRIS) to support the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Chemical, Biological, Radiological, Nuclear Explosives (CBRNE) National Operations. The selected bidder will be required to provide one (1) Chemring LORIS Kit to enhance capabilities in the area of Explosives Ordnance Disposal (EOD).

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS3950601582-Doc4131103818
* **Publication Date**: August 10, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Location**: Winnipeg, MB, Canada
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

## Submission Requirements

* Suppliers interested in bidding on this project must submit a statement of capability by August 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT.
* The statement of capability must meet the requirements set out in the ACAN.
* If no supplier submits a statement of capability that meets the requirements, the contracting officer may proceed with the award to the pre-identified supplier.

## Purchase Specifications
The LORIS Kit will be purchased by the Explosive Disposal Unit (EDU) located in Manitoba.

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Matthew Keenan, Contracting Officer
Department of Public Works and Government Services (TPSGC/PWGS)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
Phone: Not provided
Email: [matthew.keenan@tspgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.keenan@tspgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## External Link
A copy of the tender is available on the Ariba Discovery website at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17131547?extsite=MTcxMzE1NDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17131547?extsite=MTcx
